p: Bovine mastitis is the most serious diary problem in terms of economic losses to the dairy industry. With new generations of virulence and resistant bacteria, finding alternative treatments with medicinal plants to control these pathogenic strains is very popular. Among others, the ethanol extract of M. vulgare shows good antibacterial activity against methicillin-resistant staphylococci and multi-resistant Escherichia coli strains isolated from animals with mastitis manifestation [ 104].
